title: Ticket #4921: fix unit test failure in redhat 5 OS for python-bindings classad test
description:
In the bat lab the clasad_tests python script for the python bindings breaks. This is due to issues with python modules in Red Hat 5 OS. (datetime module)

Removing inclusion of this test on that OS as that OS will be deprecated soon.
check_ins: 2015-Mar-04 10:03   Check-in [43504]: Ticket #4921, In the bat lab the clasad_tests python script for the python bindings breaks. This is due to issues with python modules in Red Hat 5 OS. (datetime module) Removing inclusion of this test on that OS as that OS will be deprecated soon. (By Ivan Calderon )
